replies.msg:
歡迎各位fm bb，有咩關於space嘅問題可以喺道問
year 2同老鬼都可以幫手答

Frequently Asked Questions: 

1.點DEFER學費? 
打封英文解釋信 
加埋offer letter+經濟困難證明文件+留位費收據既copy 
交份copy去space院校就得 
帶埋所有文件正本比人check 
之後返去等通知 
詳情可以打去space問 
by梵高的星夜 

2.咩係天書? 
係KEC十樓，有每年不同科升大學的數據，包括公開試成績，GPA，IELTS，interview問題 

3. SPACE最伏係邊幾科? 
沒有廢科，只有廢人 

4. 常用連結
https://learner.hkuspace.hku.hk/

交學費、add drop swap科、睇timetable、apply locker、download notes、交功課、reference letter、圖書館book 房、睇/買transcript、 withdraw from study全部經portal入到

港大附屬學院成績驕人 是你首選

1/3升讀三兩大
2/3升讀八大UGC



同學連SEM BREAK都不忘回校，手執書卷努力溫習，反映學術氣氛濃厚


關於killer......
唔少人都話space有killer，永遠榮譽太空人港英狗（戇鳩仔）咁講：


不過我自己咁睇，我覺得好多因素影響grade嘅，每個lecturer點都要派啲A+派啲B-，如果你嗰班多勁人，有對比之下你自然睇落差啲；相反你嗰班本身廢廢哋，而你水平又稍為高啲啲，assignment同present做得好啲，個A/A+自然袋袋平安。加埋出grade前每個lecturer比嘅grade都會微調，assignment A+final grade拉落A A-拉上A+都有，9分努力1分運氣，做好自己結果唔會太差嘅，唔對路咪add drop轉班囉。

唔好聽到人話某個lecturer教得好就狗衝（尤其中英文），入到去比成班英文啪啪聲嘅學霸堂堂屌打，出gdp嘅時候就欲哭無淚。某啲傳說中嘅killer無人reg，結果一個學霸都無，呢個就係你大顯身手嘅時候，多啲答問題問問題唔好怕醜，啲廢人一定笑鳩你多嘢講，你要記住平時分就係咁樣來，出gdp嗰陣你揸隻A佢揸隻B，睇下邊個笑到最後。同埋千祈唔好遲到同埋走堂，平時分執豆咁執，蘇州過後無艇搭，無咗呢10%話知你全部assignment A+ final grade都唔會上到A+。機會只係劉備勤力嘅人，做人做狗自己決定

*雖然最頂寫住「沒有廢科，只有廢人」，只係祖訓來架咋，EE(energy & environment)、AA(Art appreciation)、IPhil(Introduction to philosophy)呢三科係大伏，揀咗嘅自己睇路，drop科保平安

祝各位太空人早日返回地球



比啲掙扎！

I want you to 過三爆四

有無人hkuspcae既advanced diploma

黎緊會讀


而家係咪zoom上堂

諗緊讀唔讀曬4科一次過

Further to the College Principal’s messages on 4 December 2020 and 5 January 2021, and having reviewed the current COVID-19 situation, the College has decided to extend the online instruction (via Zoom) for one more week till 27 February 2021. Partial face-to-face (f2f) meetings will be resumed from 1 March 2021. Detailed teaching arrangements of your courses will be announced by respective course teachers nearer the time.

All course assessment will remain the same irrespective of the mode of instruction. There will be no onsite final examination and all end-of-term assessment will take place online.

Health and safety of the College community is our priority. When you come to the campus, you are required to:

1) Complete the Health Declaration Form
2) Have temperature check
3) Wear face mask at all times
4) Maintain proper social distancing
5) Maintain good personal hygiene


If you have coronavirus symptoms or feel unwell, please stay home and see a doctor.

Please also refer to the protocols posted on the Learner Portal for more details.

The College will closely monitor the COVID-19 situation and you will be informed of any changes as soon as possible. Be prepared to switch back to online delivery for all courses at short notice. We wish you good health and prosperity in the Year of Ox.

We look forward to meeting you in person soon.
